  • Method Details

    • issueOrder

      public boolean issueOrder(String p_command, Map p_map, List<Player> p_players)
      Issues orders based on a random strategy: 1. Reinforces a randomly chosen owned territory. 2. For each owned territory with enemy neighbors, randomly selects one enemy to attack. 3. Randomly shifts armies between adjacent friendly territories.
      Specified by:
      issueOrder in class Player
      Parameters:
      p_command - The command string (ignored in this strategy).
      p_map - The map containing the territories.
      p_players - A list of all players in the game.
      Returns:
      true if at least one order was issued, false otherwise.

      Description copied from class: Player
